caption.center: CEDRIC C. WILLIAMS, Respondent/Petitioner-Appellee v. ROBERT AONA,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CIVIL CASE NO. 1SS07-1-859)
opinion.attorneys: Frederick W. Rohlfing and Michael G. Kozak, for petitioner/respondent-appellant on the application.

center.underline: ORDER ACCEPTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: DUFFY, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, JJ., and Circuit Judge Chang, assigned by reason of vacancy.
opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/Respondent-Appellant Robert Aona's application for writ of certiorari, filed on March 27, 2009, is hereby accepted.
